author: rishabhvasudevan
content: Hey Guys, I had a query, Is it possible to find the validators that a node/client is signing for, Just by knowing the address of the node/client? Would something like crawling the peer to peer network reveal the validators that a client is signing for? Or Is it possible to find the node/client using the validator address?

author: rishabhvasudevan
content: <@755590043632140352> could you help me with this?

author: sproul
content:
it's kind of hard to do, but in theory it's possible. I haven't followed the latest on this front, but this ethresear.ch post might be a good starting point: <https://ethresear.ch/t/packetology-validator-privacy/7547>

the basic idea is that you can observe messages published on gossip and try to trace them back to the peer that published them first

author: rishabhvasudevan
content: Thanks a lot, will look into it
